item.title: Haskell Simple HTTP Server
item.description: I’m pushing myself to learn Haskell, but I realized that the best way to learn is to make things, broke them and build them again. So I decided to start a toy project to create a substitute for commands like $ python3 -m http.server or $ php -S 0.0.0.0:8000 that fires a simple HTTP server to look your HTML files. For this, I have a twitter thread to log me and avoid procrastination.
